attributes.action: lower tax on energy saving goods and services, such as fuel efficient cars, energy saving light bulbs and councils that recycle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lower tax on energy saving good and services, instead of increasing tax on goods and services deemed to be damaging our environment.  For example, a lower tax on energy saving light bulbs, lower tax for people who recycle more, a lower tax for environmentally friendly fuel consumption.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
